attributes.action: No more laws / rules to be changed to suit the EU until AFTER an EU Referendum.
attributes.additional_details: UK Tax Credits being changed to stop immigration after a ruling by the EU that all rules had to apply equally to any member of the EU, whether or not they had paid into the system they want to take from.
attributes.background: Why should the British people keep having our laws and rules changed to suit the EU? We petition that no more EU laws, EU Regulations etc can be introduced into the UK until AFTER the EU Referendum and then only if people decide to stay in the EU.
